categories.description:
=Description: Client requests for marketing services including GMB management, SEO optimization, social media content creation, website updates, online reputation management, or any actionable work items for medical practice promotion in India.
Task Indicators:

Action words: can you, please, need, want, make, create, update, fix, change, add, remove, optimize, improve
Service-related terms: post, content, website, GMB, Google, SEO, ranking, ads, social media, review, design
Request phrases: I need, Could you, Would you, Help me, I want you to

Task Examples:

Can you post about our new ayurvedic treatments?
Please make my clinic appear in top 3 search results
I need fresh content for my Instagram page
Update the contact details on my Google listing
Create a promotional video for our physiotherapy center
Please write blog content about preventive healthcare
Can you manage my online reviews this week?
I want better photos for my dental clinic's website
Please schedule Navratri health tips posts
Can you create ads for our health checkup packages?
I need help with local SEO for my practice
Please update my clinic's services on the website
Create content about monsoon health precautions
Can you improve my Google My Business optimization?
I want to launch a campaign for World Health Day
Please handle the social media for our vaccination drive
Can you create patient education videos?
I need a redesign of my appointment booking system
Please optimize my practice for voice search
Can you create WhatsApp marketing templates?

=Description: Conversational messages, appreciation, general discussion, personal updates, or informational exchanges that don't require immediate marketing action.
Not Task Examples:

The campaign results exceeded our expectations!
I really appreciate your dedication to my practice
Just wanted to share some good news about patient feedback
Hope you and your team are doing well
The medical conference was very informative
Thank you for the detailed monthly report
I'm impressed with the increase in appointment bookings
Wishing you success in your business too
The patient engagement has improved a lot
I'll be closed for Ganesh Chaturthi holidays
Great work on the recent Instagram growth
Just checking in to see how everything is going
The new patients are mentioning they found us online
I'm very satisfied with our partnership
Have a blessed Karva Chauth
The Google reviews are looking much better now
Thank you for being so responsive
I'm recommending your services to other doctors
The ROI from digital marketing is excellent
Looking forward to continuing our work together
